headline: Halliburton promotes Casey Maxwell to president, Western Hemisphere
summary: Halliburton (HAL) announced that Casey Maxwell, senior vice president North America Land, has been promoted to president, Western Hemisphere, effective February 1. Maxwell joined Halliburton in 2006 as a field associate in Odessa, Texas. He has advanced through roles of increasing responsibility in field sales, technical sales, business development, and area leadership based in Midland, Denver, and Buenos Aires, Argentina. He holds a bachelor’s degree in architecture and an MBA from Texas Tech U

content.title: Halliburton promotes Casey Maxwell to president, Western Hemisphere
content.summary: Halliburton (HAL) announced that Casey Maxwell, senior vice president North America Land, has been promoted to president, Western Hemisphere, effective February 1. Maxwell joined Halliburton in 2006 as a field associate in Odessa, Texas. He has advanced through roles of increasing responsibility in field sales, technical sales, business development, and area leadership based in Midland, Denver, and Buenos Aires, Argentina. He holds a bachelor’s degree in architecture and an MBA from Texas Tech U
